title: Power Type
description:
Power Types are what grants functionality to your origins! Each power has a type, specified with a type field in the JSON. Which type a power is defines which other fields it requires and supports.
Type: 'origins:modify_exhaustion'
- Modifies the amount of exhaustion the player receives each time they receive exhaustion.

modifier.description: If specified, this modifier will be applied to the received exhaustion amount.

modifiers.description: If specified, these modifiers will be applied to the received exhaustion amount.
